backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor implementing access-controlled model storage, user profiles, and model queries with authorization mixins and blob storage support.
backend/migration.mo: Placeholder migration module returning an empty upgraded actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping project features to files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing key frontend files and their roles in the application.
frontend/.ic-assets.json5: Asset canister configuration defining security headers and caching rules for production deployment.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Documentation outlining prerequisites and step‑by‑step instructions for deploying the app to IC mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining light/dark theme color variables and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file loading the root React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app container handling navigation, authentication, profile setup, and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Component restricting access to authenticated users and displaying a sign-in prompt when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal that collects a user's name and saves their profile using a mutation hook with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current caller's user profile once the actor is available, handling loading state from identity resolution.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity restoration, and status state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on models, user profiles, and funding status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/costEstimator.ts: Utility functions for estimating ICP cycle costs based on storage, compute usage, and formatting large numbers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, wraps the app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/CostEstimatorPage.tsx: UI page allowing users to adjust model parameters and see estimated monthly and yearly ICP costs.
frontend/src/pages/FundingPage.tsx: Displays live canister funding status, supports copying IDs, refreshing data, and includes a 10‑year cycles cost estimator.
frontend/src/pages/InferencePage.tsx: Provides a demo interface to select a model and run simulated inference, showing mock results and handling input validation.
frontend/src/pages/LimitationsPage.tsx: Explains IC platform constraints like CPU-only execution and memory limits, and outlines feasible AI model types.
frontend/src/pages/ModelManagementPage.t: Allows authenticated users to upload, update, and delete model artifacts with size checks and metadata handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with additional plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project schema, goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature requirements for building an ICP-hosted AI model app with real inference, funding flow, and long-term operation support.
